usage.description: Initializes an interactive session to create a package.json file
Creates a package.json file with default values
Creates a package.json file with default values and sets the private property to true

commands.name: create
commands.description: Creates new projects from any create-* starter kits

usage.description: Creates <starter-kit-package>
Creates <starter-kit-package> with [<args>]

commands.name: add
commands.description: Installs a package and any packages that it depends on

usage.description: Installs [package-name] and updates package.json and yarn.lock files
Installs [package-name]@[version] and updates package.json and yarn.lock files
Installs [package-name]@[tag] and updates package.json and yarn.lock files

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes a package and any packages that it depends on

usage.description: Removes [package-name] from package.json and yarn.lock files

commands.name: install
commands.description: Installs all dependencies for the current project

usage.description: Installs all dependencies for the current project
Verifies that already installed files in node_modules did not get removed
Install all the dependencies, but only allow one version for each package
Refetches all packages, even ones that were previously installed
Don’t read or generate a yarn.lock lockfile.
Don’t generate a yarn.lock lockfile.
Show additional logs while installing dependencies

commands.name: upgrade
commands.description: Upgrades packages to their latest version based on the specified range

usage.description: Upgrades packages to their latest version
Upgrades [package-name] to its latest version
Upgrades [package-name] to its latest version in the 1.x.x range

commands.name: list
commands.description: Lists all dependencies for the current working directory

usage.description: Lists all dependencies for the current working directory
Lists all dependencies for the current working directory with a depth of [depth]
Fetches information about [package-name]

commands.name: pack
commands.description: Creates a compressed gzip archive of package dependencies.

usage.description: Creates a compressed gzip archive of package dependencies

commands.name: global
commands.description: Prefix used for a number of commands like add, remove, list and bin

usage.description: Installs [package-name] globally
Removes [package-name] globally
Lists globally installed packages
Prints the location where Yarn will install symlinks to your installed
Print the output of the global installation folder that houses the global node_modules

commands.name: audit
commands.description: Perform a vulnerability audit against the installed packages

usage.description: Audits only dependencies
Audits both dependencies and devDependencies
